name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality Bluetooth 5.0 headphones with deep bass, noise cancellation, and 20 hours of battery life.

name: Smart Watch Series 5
description: Track your fitness, heart rate, and sleep with the latest smart watch featuring AMOLED display.

name: Wireless Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable wireless speaker with powerful sound and 12 hours of playtime. Waterproof design for outdoor use.

name: Gaming Mouse RGB
description: Ergonomic RGB gaming mouse with adjustable DPI, 6 programmable buttons, and ultra-smooth scroll.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: Compact RGB mechanical keyboard with blue switches and aluminum body for fast typing and gaming.

name: Full HD Monitor 24-inch
description: 24-inch IPS display with 75Hz refresh rate, ultra-slim design, and vivid color reproduction for work and gaming.

name: Laptop Stand Adjustable
description: Aluminum adjustable laptop stand with heat dissipation design and ergonomic viewing angle.

name: External Hard Drive 1TB
description: High-speed USB 3.0 external hard drive for backup and storage. Plug-and-play compatible with all systems.

name: Smartphone Tripod Stand
description: Flexible tripod stand for smartphones with Bluetooth remote, perfect for photography and vlogging.

name: Portable Power Bank 20000mAh
description: Fast-charging portable power bank with dual USB output and LED charge indicator.
